  • Method Details

    • getRegistrableProjects

      public static List<Project> getRegistrableProjects(HDBOfficer officer)
      Retrieves a list of projects that the given officer is eligible to register for. A project is considered registrable if: - The officer is not already assigned to it. - The officer has not already registered for it. - The project does not overlap in application period with an assigned project. - The project has not closed.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer attempting to register.
      Returns:
      A list of registrable Project objects.

    • viewRegistrableProjects

      public static void viewRegistrableProjects(HDBOfficer officer)
      Displays the list of registrable projects for the given officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer attempting to view available projects.

    • registerForProject

      public void registerForProject(HDBOfficer officer)
      Allows an HDB officer to register for a project. The registration will only be allowed if: - The officer does not have an active project. - The selected project is in the registrable list. Prompts the user for input until valid project and confirmation are received.
      Specified by:
      registerForProject in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer attempting to register.

    • viewRegistrations

      public void viewRegistrations(HDBOfficer officer)
      Displays a list of all projects the given officer has registered for, including their registration status.
      Specified by:
      viewRegistrations in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer whose registrations are being displayed.

    • printAssignedProject

      public void printAssignedProject(HDBOfficer officer)
      Prints the project to which the officer is currently assigned, if any.
      Specified by:
      printAssignedProject in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer whose assigned project is to be printed.
